name: places/ChIJY07OBp_2wokR7Q3d6deKo6A
formattedAddress: 638 W 174th St, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 638 W 174th St, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text:
All I can say is absolutely wonderful things about Champions Martial Arts Washington Heights. Not only are they exceptionally talented and dedicated in their craft, but they have a natural affinity for working with children.
Every instructor exudes patience, kindness, and genuine interest in nurturing young minds.

Beyond the physical techniques, they instill positive life skills that kids can carry with them into adulthood: discipline, respect, perseverance, and self-confidence.

Tae kwon do isn't just a martial art; it's a pathway to personal growth and development. I truly believe that Champions Martial Arts is the ideal place to enrich your child's journey, teaching them not only how to defend themselves but also how to lead, love, and live life with integrity. If you're considering a space where your children can blossom both physically and mentally, look no further than here.

My Two Daughters would agree they love going each time and always look forward to continue their journey with Champions Martial Arts Washington Heights.

originalText.text: My 5 yr old has been enrolled in the Tae Kwon Do program here for about 5 months now and we absolutely love it. He looks forward to attaining new belts and learning the moves. I love how they instill respect and discipline and good behavior. I would definitely recommend it for any child. Exercise, sense of accomplishment, new friends can all happen here. Great place. The staff is absolutely respectful and kind as well.

originalText.text: This is an amazing place to grow in many ways. The Masters are extremely respectful and caring. Bringing my kid to this school has been the best investment of this year. I feel Taekwondo is a must to do for kids.

text.text: This is an amazing place to grow in many ways. The Masters are extremely respectful and caring. Bringing my kid to this school has been the best investment of this year. I feel Taekwondo is a must to do for kids.

originalText.text: I think the solid list of five star reviews at Champions Tae Kwon Do speak for themselves. But will add context that the instructors (Masters) are the best around! Families come from all around to bring their children here. They host adult classes in the evening. If you are even contemplating joining, take a trial lesson or month. You will not regret it.

originalText.text: I’m so hesitant to write review because I like keeping a good place to myself lol. My daughter loves this place. She is excited to attend every class and motivated not intimidated to do her very best. I love what they teach and despite having different level classes and students they remembered her name from the first day with no issue. If you join, we will see you here
